import React,{useState} from 'react' import {ReactComponent as StatsIcon}from '../icons/stats_icon.svg' import {ReactComponent as Xicon} from '../icons/x-icon.svg' const Stats = (props) => { const { pending, students, lessons, salary } = props const [state,setState] = useState(false) return (
{!state && {setState(true)}} />} {state&&

Pending payment: {pending} zł

Students amount: {students}

All lessons time: {lessons} h/week

Salary per week: {salary} zł

{setState(false)}} id='x-icon' />
}
) } export default Stats
